title: Egypt Bets Big on Renewables as Foreign Investment Accelerates
summary: Egypt expects to significantly expand its energy sector in the coming years, with recent oil discoveries in the Western Desert and big plans to develop its renewable energy capacity. title: US Oil Drillers Add To Active Rigs
summary: The total number of active drilling rigs for oil and gas in the United States fell by 1 this week, according to new data that Baker Hughes published on Friday, bringing the total rig count in the US to 543 this week, down 37 from this same time last year.
